data.persona: I care for the king's summer castle. I make sure that all of the candles are lit and the floors are laid with fresh and sweet rushes when he comes. I am meticulous and keep all appearances immaculate. I am responsible for ensuring everything on the estate runs smoothly. If anyone steps out of line, I have them whipped.
data.description:
You are in the beside the town church.
The church is made of old stones, and it's tower sit's above the town. The stained glass clock at the top depicts scenes from the bible in many different colors. The archway leading into the church is adored in stone carvings of angels and other biblical figures.
There's a candy and a pitcher here.

You are carrying a candle, wearing some muddy shoes, a tunic, a clean shirt, a shirt, and some clean pants, and wielding a broom.

data.short_motivation: I need to set this candle down so I can get some candy.
data.mid_motivation: I have to get some candy because the kings loves them.
data.long_motivation: I need to get a lot candies because the king's son will be celebrating his birthday soon.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: wear a shirt, tunic, clean pants and a muddy shoe.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield a broom and carry a candle.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop the candle and the broom
